hours_of_operation: Monday-Friday 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time. For after-hours, holidays, and weekends, call 1-877-597-2331 (1-877-KYSAFE1)
eligibility_requirements: Any person with reasonable cause to suspect adult abuse, neglect, or exploitation. Mandatory reporting for certain professionals including healthcare workers, social workers, law enforcement, and financial institutions. Reports can be made anonymously.
populations_served: Adults 18 and older who are vulnerable to abuse, neglect, or exploitation due to mental or physical disabilities, advanced age, or other factors that impair their ability to protect themselves or meet basic needs
languages_available: English and Spanish. Translation services available for other languages through the hotline system.
description: Toll-free hotline for reporting suspected abuse, neglect, or exploitation of adults in Kentucky. Available Monday-Friday 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time. For after-hours, holidays, and weekends, call 1-877-597-2331. Operated by the Kentucky Cabinet for Health and Family Services, Department for Community Based Services. Investigates all known or suspected incidents of adult maltreatment and provides protective services to vulnerable adults.
